name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience developing high-performance software solutions, adept in **Java**, **Spring**, **JPA**, **JDBC**, **Spring Data**, and **JUnit**. Proficient in building scalable applications using **Angular** and managing databases such as **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Well-versed in integrating messaging systems via **Kafka**, **JMS**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Solace**. Expertise in implementing CI/CD practices with **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **ArgoCD** to streamline deployment processes. Skilled in test automation with **Cypress** and **Jest**, and experienced with infrastructure management tools like **Grafana** and **Prometheus**.

In addition to core technical skills, I bring extensive knowledge in developing enterprise platforms with a focus on microservices architecture and event-driven systems. I have hands-on experience deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My background includes building and managing ML pipelines within MLOps, utilizing frameworks such as **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating impactful systems, I strive to embed intelligent decision-making capabilities across applications.

experience.responsibilities:

• Engineered microservices architecture leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for scalable deployment, achieving a 99.9% uptime across applications.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **ArgoCD** and **Maven**, streamlining deployments and reducing release cycles by **30%**.
• Enhanced application performance by integrating messaging solutions such as **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, improving data flow efficiency by **40%**.
• Developed and executed test cases using **JUnit**, **Cypress**, and **Jest**, ensuring comprehensive coverage with greater than **90%** pass rate in automated tests.
• Utilized **ElasticSearch** to facilitate advanced search functionalities, enhancing data retrieval speed by **50%** across vast datasets.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate and deploy applications in **Azure** while using monitoring tools like **Grafana** and **Prometheus** for performance tracking and optimization.
• Led the migration of legacy systems to microservices with an emphasis on utilizing **Spring Data** and **JDBC** for seamless database interactions and data migration strategies.
• Adopted best practices for API development using **Vertx** and **RXJava**, ensuring responsive real-time data processing in client applications.
• Drove team initiatives in code optimization and maintainability, creating design documentation and style guides with **Angular Material Harness** and **Storybook** for component-driven development.

Utilized **Java** and **Spring** frameworks to develop robust microservices, ensuring high availability and scalability within financial applications, processing up to **10,000** transactions per second.
Implemented data access layers using **JPA** and **JDBC**, enhancing the efficiency of database interactions with **PostgreSQL** and **MariaDB**, resulting in a **30%** decrease in query response times.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using **Spring Data**, facilitating seamless communication between microservices and front-end components.
Conducted unit testing with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, achieving **95%** code coverage, ensuring quality and stability in delivered solutions.
Developed dynamic web applications using **Angular** (latest versions) and **Angular Material Harness**, which improved user engagement by **40%** through responsive and visually appealing interfaces.
Integrated asynchronous messaging using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing event-driven architectures for real-time data processing and establishing a reliable notification system for critical financial events.
Managed CI/CD pipelines via **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, automating deployment processes and enhancing the overall development lifecycle with **ArgoCD** for smooth releases.
Executed performance monitoring and logging with **Grafana** and **Prometheus**, allowing real-time insights into application health and user interactions.
Led the migration of legacy systems to cloud infrastructure on **Azure**, ensuring compliance and scalability while reducing operational costs by **25%**.
Collaborated in cross-functional teams to implement best practices in DevOps, using tools like **Liquibase** for version control of database changes and **Cypress** for end-to-end testing.

Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Java (Spring, JPA, JDBC, Spring Data)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Developed frontend applications using **Angular** and integrated with Java services, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL**, **MariaDB**, **MySQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **ArgoCD**, ensuring streamlined and efficient deployment processes with a focus on automated testing and high-quality releases.
Applied testing frameworks such as **JUnit**, **Cypress**, and **Jest** to enhance code quality, achieving over **95%** test coverage across modules.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with third-party tools ensuring PCI-compliance while handling sensitive data responsibly.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
Monitored application performance and health using **Grafana** and **Prometheus**, achieving over **99%** uptime and quick incident response times.
